# init(items:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a media item collection with an array of media items.

## Declaration

```swift
init(items: [MPMediaItem])
```

## Parameters

- **items**: The array of items you assign to the media item collection.

## Return Value

The newly created media item collection.
title: init(items:)
